mapper.sql: id, wfnodezb_dm, pre_wfnodezb_dm, wfmc, wf_desc, rygwdz_dm, lczt_dm, dept_dm, lcjdbj, zsbj, qybj, czrq, xgrq, user_dm, next_wfnodezb_dm
mapper.insert: insert into dm_wf_nodezb (id, pre_wfnodezb_dm, wfmc, wf_desc, rygwdz_dm, lczt_dm, dept_dm, lcjdbj, zsbj, qybj, czrq, xgrq, user_dm, next_wfnodezb_dm) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wfmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rygwdzDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lcztDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lcjdbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nextWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dm_wf_nodezb
id,
pre_wfnodezb_dm,
wfmc,
wf_desc,
rygwdz_dm,
lczt_dm,
dept_dm,
lcjdbj,
zsbj,
qybj,
czrq,
xgrq,
user_dm,
next_wfnodezb_dm,

mapper.update:
update dm_wf_nodezb
wfnodezb_dm = #{wfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pre_wfnodezb_dm = #{preWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wfmc = #{wfmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wf_desc = #{wfDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rygwdz_dm = #{rygwdzDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lczt_dm = #{lcztDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lcjdbj = #{lcjdbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zsbj = #{zsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
next_wfnodezb_dm = #{nextWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_wf_nodezb set wfnodezb_dm = #{wfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pre_wfnodezb_dm = #{preWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wfmc = #{wfmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wf_desc = #{wfDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rygwdz_dm = #{rygwdzDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lczt_dm = #{lcztDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lcjdbj = #{lcjdbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zsbj = #{zsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, next_wfnodezb_dm = #{nextWfnodezbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select n.next_wfnodezb_dm from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_wf_rygwdzb r INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u where n.rygwdz_dm = r.rygwdz_dm and n.dept_dm = u.dept_dm and r.user_dm = u.user_dm and u.user_dm = #{userDm} limit 1
select * from dm_wf_nodezb where wfnodezb_dm = #{node} and qybj = 1 limit 1

select l.xmzt_dm from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_wf_rygwdzb r INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u INNER JOIN dm_cs_lczt l where n.rygwdz_dm = r.rygwdz_dm and n.dept_dm = u.dept_dm and n.lczt_dm = l.lczt_dm and n.qybj = 1 and r.qybj = 1 and u.qybj = 1 and l.qybj = 1 and u.user_dm = #{userDm} limit 1

select n.zsbj from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_wf_rygwdzb r INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u INNER JOIN dm_cs_lczt l where n.rygwdz_dm = r.rygwdz_dm and n.dept_dm = u.dept_dm and n.lczt_dm = l.lczt_dm and n.qybj = 1 and r.qybj = 1 and u.qybj = 1 and l.qybj = 1 and u.user_dm = #{userDm} limit 1

select l.xmzt_dm from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u INNER JOIN dm_cs_lczt l where n.dept_dm = u.dept_dm and l.lczt_dm = n.lczt_dm and n.qybj = 1 and u.qybj = 1 and l.qybj = 1 and u.user_dm = #{userDm} limit 1

select n.wfnodezb_dm from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_wf_rygwdzb r INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u where n.rygwdz_dm = r.rygwdz_dm and u.user_dm = r.user_dm and r.qybj = 1 and u.qybj = 1 and n.qybj = 1 and u.user_dm = #{userDm}

select l.xmzt_dm from dm_cs_user u INNER JOIN dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_cs_lczt l where u.dept_dm = n.dept_dm and l.lczt_dm = n.lczt_dm and n.qybj = 1 and l.qybj = 1 and u.qybj = 1 and u.user_dm = #{userDm}
select n.dept_dm from dm_wf_nodezb n INNER JOIN dm_wf_rygwdzb r where r.rygwdz_dm = n.rygwdz_dm and r.qybj = 1 and n.qybj = 1 and r.user_dm = #{userId}
